section1.ecosystem_made_for: Ecosystem made for new generation developers pushing innovation behind blockchain application and software development

section2.bringing_the_new_heading: Bringing the new generation developers closer to build a community of innovation in the field of blockchain and software development
section2.codex_on_althash_subheading: Codex on Althash is a software company that specializes in creation of blockchain applications, programming, services (SaaS)

item1.heading: We started the journey in 2019
item1.content: The company was created in response to a growing community on Althash where developers needed an ecosystem to interact and communicate in.

item2.heading: CodexWalletBot on Telegram Launched
item2.content: CodexWalletBot allowed users in the Althash ecosystem to easily communicate with each other while simultaneously sending and receiving HTMLCoin and tokens.

item4.heading: Promoting the Blockchain Development/HTML Coin/AltHash
item4.content: The Codex Team contains members from the HTMLCoin community, as well as a few founding members of HTMLBunker.

section3.subheading: A community that believes in innovation
section3.content: The Codex mission is to continuously build an ecosystem of programmers and developers on Althash with focus on building value through utility. By on-boarding many skilled freelancers, we are able to introduce them to the HTMLCoin software as well as promote applicatory advancements for Codex on Althash.

item1.heading: Lightening Fast Transfers
item1.content: Sending HRC20 tokens takes just minutes. Using the 'CodexWalletBot' you can check your pending transactions as well as see your balance.

item2.heading: Nearly Fee-less Transactions
item2.content: With HTMLCoinâ€™s current market valuation you can send hundreds of transactions for pennies, and each transaction will cost less than 1 HTML.

item3.heading: Based on HTMLCoin
item3.content: A secure blockchain that is entirely based on the smart contracts of Ethereum and the Bitcoin Core Network.
